titleStmt.title: Advice to the ladies of London, in the choice of their husbands. To an excellent new court tune. This may be printed, R.P.
titleStmt.author: D'Urfey, Thomas, 1653-1723.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Back, at the Black Boy, [...] draw-bridge on London-Bridge.,

notesStmt.note: Date of publication suggested by Wing
Verse: "Ladies of London both wealthy and fair ..."

Reproduction of original in the British Library.
